description:
Following in the footsteps of my noble friend Almir Germano, follows my first Jupiter Gif this season.
9 shots were taken as the first test, each shot with 10,000 frames, with 3,000 stacks being stacked, post-processing in Registax, Photofiltre and Fitswork exactly the same, even though the differences in seeing are reflected from film to film.
Each capture lasted exactly 60 sec with a pause also if 60 sec.
I concluded that the 60 sec interval between filming is a bit long which prevents the feeling of continuous motion. I have one more Gif to complete using the same parameters, but in the next, I will reduce the interval to 30 sec pause with 60 sec footage to see if I get a more natural movement.
title: Jupiter, Gif 1
